select gt.gym_id, gt.gym_name, gt.gym_address, gt.gym_tel, gt.businessnumber, gt.gym_price, gt.gym_img_url,
lc.like_count,
ut.user_id, ut.username, ut.password, ut.name, ut.phone, ut.email, ut.weight, ut.height, ut.birthdate
from gym_tb gt left outer join user_tb ut on (ut.user_id = gt.user_id) left outer join (select gym_id, count(*) as like_count from gym_like_tb group by gym_id) lc on(lc.gym_id = gt.gym_id) where 1=1
and gt.gym_name like concat("%",#{searchValue}, "%")
order By gt.gym_id
limit #{index},20;

select gt.gym_id, gt.gym_name, gt.gym_address, gt.gym_tel, gt.businessnumber, gt.gym_price, gt.gym_img_url,
ut.user_id, ut.username, ut.password, ut.name, ut.phone, ut.email, ut.weight, ut.height, ut.birthdate from gym_tb gt left outer join user_tb ut on (ut.user_id = gt.user_id) where gt.gym_id = #{gymId}

select count(*) from gym_tb gt left outer join user_tb ut on(ut.user_id = gt.user_id) where 1=1
and gt.gym_name like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
select count(*) from gym_like_tb where gym_id = #{gymId}
select count(*) from gym_like_tb where gym_id = #{gymId} and user_id = #{userId}
select gym_address from gym_tb where gym_address like concat("%",#{myAddress},"%")
